userseditcount-desc: Special page listing edit counts for all editors
userseditcount-estimate: (Note: edit counts when no date filter is set are estimates and may not match edit counts with date filters, even if all edits are within the same period.)
userseditcount-headerlinks: View edit counts for the last: $1 | $2 | $3 | $4 | $5 | $6
userseditcount-headingtext: The following is a list of all registered editors on {{SITENAME}}, sorted by total edit count.
userseditcount-showrange-day: Showing counts for the last day.
userseditcount-showrange-days: Showing counts for the last {{PLURAL:$1|$1 days|day}}.
userseditcount-showrange-week: Showing counts for the last week.
userseditcount-showrange-month: Showing counts for the last month.
userseditcount-showrange-6month: Showing counts for the last six months.
userseditcount-showrange-year: Showing counts for the last year.
